litany against fear

coding with spice ¤ by nick quaranto

written

I tend to write/blog a lot. Here’s a comprehensive list of my articles online.

Git Ready

A knowledge base about Git that focuses on learning things ‘one commit at a time’. Now with over 50 tips and 4 translated sites in the works, it has become a great resource for those both new and old to the version control system.

GitHub Rebase

A biweekly roundup about the latest and greatest projects coming out of GitHub, posted on the GitHub blog.

The Internbot Chronicles

Telling the tale of my experiences as an intern at Thoughtbot on Giant Robots Smashing into Other Giant Robots.

Kodak

During my time as an intern at Kodak in the summer of 2008 I was given the chance to write on the company’s photography blog, A Thousand Words.
